_sText:
VipintheMix V1.2 [RELEASED] It's my very first jailmap. Based on Electric_VIP but fully remastered.

Map features:
  • Soccer
  • Speedrunway
  • LR-Room
  • Guntoss
  • Knifefight
  • Race
  • Pool
  • Diving spots
  • Slide tube
  • Vipcel
  • Disco
  • Minipool
  • Bar
  • Yard
  • Jumpcontest
  • Basketball
  • Bunnyhop
  • Skate
  • Throw contest
  • Dodgeball
  • Bigjail
  • Loads of secrets! 

Video with all the secrets

Songs used:

  •  Deadmau5 - Ghosts 'n Stuff
  •  Deadmau5 - Strobe 
  • Afrojack - Take over Control 
  • Martin Solveig - Hello
  •  David Guetta / Rihanna - Who's that chick  
  • Showtek - We Speak Music

Explanation Games 

  1. Diving Spots - The point of diving is diving into the colored 'baths'. When you are at green you should jump in green. 
  2. Dodgeball - Take place in the red/blue chambers. Someone press the start button above and dodgeball will start. 
  3. Speed-runway - Just a runway around soccer. Just for the bored CTs. 
  4. Xtreme Guntoss - Run over the push_trigger and fly around the corner with a curve. Throw your gun as far as possible. Just like regular guntoss. 
  5. Throw contest - Only 1 v 1 person at a time. When you are with 2 in 1 chamber it won't work! Once it starts throw the nades into the green holes. It is camp proof. You will die after 60 seconds. Wait a few seconds before the next run. It doesn't work all the time. 70% it does. 30% doesn't.


Suggested plugins and settings are:

  • phys_pushscale 900
  • sv_airaccelerate 100 (or higher)
  • Nosmoke plugins (sourcemod or eventscripts (see 4 and 5))
  •  No-smoke plugin for dodgeball: downloadable here

For questions contact me at steam.
Dutchkiller
